name="handlingSpecification" type="itk:handlingType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="trackingid" type="itk:uuid" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="service" type="xs:anyURI" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="handlingType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="spec" type="itk:handlingSpecType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> name="type" type="xs:string" use="optional" default="2.16.840.1.113883.2.1.3.2.4.18.22"/> <xs:attribute name="uri" type="xs:anyURI" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="identityType"> <xs:attribute name="type" type="xs:string" use="optional" default="2.16.840.1.113883.2.1.3.2.4.18.27"/> <xs:attribute name="uri" type="xs:anyURI" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="manifestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="manifestitem" type="itk:manifestItemType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="count" type="xs:integer" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="auditIdentityType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="itk:identityType" maxOccurs="4"/> </xs:sequence>
